jobs_results.title: Junior Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
OVERVIEW

As one of Android developers in Sportradar's Mobile Unit your responsibility will be to develop Android Mobile applications with superior UX for sport fans worldwide.

THE CHALLENGE

• Develop state-of-the-art Android mobile applications leveraging Sportradar’s data.

• Use newest development principles and frameworks recommended.

• Cooperate with designers, testers and other developers to meet the required goals.

YOUR PROFILE

• Experience with native Android development.

• You understand basic development standards and concepts.

• You understand Android development concept and know how to use Android SDK.

• You know how to use GIT.

• You are familiar with Java and Kotlin.

• You are always on the look for new technologies and are eager to try them out.

• You are fluent in English.

OUR OFFER

• A collaborative environment with colleagues from all over the world (Engineering offices in Europe, Asia and US).

• Ability to shape your own workday and career via a clearly defined professional and personal development plan.

• Opportunity to work with senior leadership team and develop yourself within an inspiring and fast-growing company.

• Vibrant and inclusive community, including Women in Tech and Pride groups which welcome all participants.

• Hybrid work model.

• New office with several additional benefits.

At Sportradar, we celebrate our diverse group of hardworking employees. Sportradar is committed to ensuring equal access to its programs, facilities, and employment opportunities. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran. We encourage you to apply even if you only meet most of the requirements (but not 100% of the listed criteria) – we believe skills evolve over time. If you’re willing to learn and grow with us, we invite you to join our team!

jobs_results.title: Software Developer: Mobile (Android)
jobs_results.description:
DevRev

DevRev is a platform purpose-built for SaaS and technology companies, helping back-office development match the rapid pace of front-office customer relationships. Our mission is to bring end users, support engineers, product managers, and developers together, making it effortless to do what matters most — and creating a company-wide culture of product and customer-centricity.

Unlike generic tools, DevRev took a blank canvas approach to collaboration, search, GenAI, and analytics, enabling SaaS companies to ship faster for the largest business impact — with continuous development, roadmapping, prioritization, customer engineering, and more. DevRev is used across departments in thousands of companies and can coexist with or replace your tools, bringing information symmetry, streamlining collaboration, and converging teams.

DevRev was founded in October 2020 and raised over $100 million in seed money from investors such as Khosla Ventures and Mayfield, making it the largest in the history of Silicon Valley. It is led by its co-founder and CEO, Dheeraj Pandey, who was previously the co-founder and CEO of Nutanix, and by Manoj Agarwal, DevRev's co-founder and former SVP of Engineering at Nutanix. DevRev is headquartered in Palo Alto, California, and has offices in seven global locations.

Job Description

We are looking for ambitious and authentic software developers who are excited to bring fresh ideas from all areas to their work, including artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design, mobile, information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, and more. As an Android Software Developer at DevRev, you’ll play a key role in crafting high-quality mobile applications. You’ll collaborate with a talented global team to deliver impactful solutions to our users.

Qualifications and Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
• Proficiency in coding using Kotlin for Android development.
• 3+ years of industry experience developing Android apps, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
• Experience with Android frameworks and libraries such as Retrofit, Room, Dagger, Koin, and Ktor.
• Familiarity with architectural patterns like MVVM and MVI, and a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code.
• Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices and a keen eye for detail.
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues.
• Experience with Kotlin Coroutines for asynchronous programming.
• Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Culture

The foundation of DevRev is its culture -- our commitment to those who are hungry, humble, honest, and who act with heart. Our vision is to help build the earth’s most customer-centric companies. Our mission is to leverage design, data engineering, and machine intelligence to empower engineers to embrace their customers.

That is DevRev!

jobs_results.title: Android developer – Java/Kotlin (m/ž)
Development | Android/Java developer
jobs_results.description:
Is it important for you to work in an industry that contributes to the common good? Would it motivate you to work for a company that focuses on early disease detection and thus saves lives? Do you see yourself in transforming the conventional medical environment by implementing advanced technologies? Then look no further!

MESI is an innovative company specializing in the development of devices that assist medical professionals. Our innovations are used in 50 countries worldwide and have received a number of awards and certifications. The pinnacle of our products is the MESI mTABLET, which connects wirelessly to various diagnostic modules. It collects all diagnostic measurements in one place and the patient’s medical history for quick and effective diagnostics.

We are looking for an Android developer to join a team responsible for the operating system and commercial applications on our MESI mTABLET. We have big plans for it, as we will be adding many new features to the system and developing APIs for external developers that will further increase the value of the mTABLET. We are unique in what we do and look forward to becoming even better with your help.

Position tasks:
• Design and build applications for the Android platform.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
• Identify and resolve bottlenecks, rectify bugs and enhance application performance.
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Key requirements:
• Java
• Kotlin
• Activity-lifecycle concepts
• Retrofit
• SQLite
• ORMlite
• At least 1-2 years of prior experience (Java or Android development)

Even better if you have experience with:
• Android OS
• JUnit
• Jira
• Git
• OpenGL

What we offer:
• A dynamic international team creating top-quality solutions in a family-friendly, supportive environment.
• Initial fixed-term employment with the possibility of permanent employment later on.
• Ample creativity.
• Independence as well as teamwork with colleagues dedicated to developing high-quality software solutions.
• Plenty of opportunity to learn and advance.
• Competitive payment.
• Flexible work hours.

Interested in getting to know us? Then press that Send button and get in touch! We are looking forward to receiving your CV at jobs@mesimedical.com subject: » Android/Java developer «.

jobs_results.title: Senior Flutter Developer (GameDev), Limassol, on-site
jobs_results.description:
About the company and the project:

The pioneering company, with 20+ game launches, 50 million downloads, and 10 million active users, seeks a visionary Senior Flutter Developer to drive innovative gaming experiences using AI technology.

Known for its groundbreaking approach in developing mobile games and applications for children, the company stands out for its commitment to blending entertainment with educational value. Their games have garnered widespread acclaim and are accessible on major platforms like the App Store, Google Play, and Amazon Store, making a significant impact on the global gaming community. With a strong focus on creativity and quality, the company fosters a collaborative environment where talented individuals thrive and contribute to shaping the future of digital entertainment.

Located in Cyprus, the company's office in Limassol offers a dynamic work environment conducive to creativity and innovation. Employees enjoy the flexibility of a hybrid work schedule, combining remote work opportunities with in-office collaboration. The office culture is characterized by a passion for excellence and a shared commitment to pushing boundaries in mobile gaming development.

Joining the team means being part of a forward-thinking organization poised to make substantial strides in the industry while enjoying a supportive and inspiring workplace culture.

Your tasks on the position:
• Build Custom packages in Flutter using the functionality and APIs already available in native Android and IOS
• Manage back-end servers written in Node JS
• Translate and Build the designs and Wireframes into high quality responsive UI code
• Familiarity with RESTFUL APIs to connect applications to back-end services
• Experience with automated testing and building
• Experience with Git, Jenkins or other version control tools
• Ability to write readable codes, create extensive documentation for existing codeandre-factor previously written codes

Requirements:
• 4+ years full-time mobile development experience (iOS, Android) with Flutter & Dart
• Expert in Dart
• Knowledge in Java, C, C#, C++, Lua, Kotlin, Swift
• Agile methodologies
• SQ Lite
• Demonstrating problem solving abilities and a keen eye for detail is essential
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
• English B2+

Benefits:
• Competitive salary with performance incentives
• Family-friendly flexible work arrangements
• Paid holidays
• Modern equipment - the latest Apple tech
• Opportunities for growth
• Collaborative and inclusive work environment
• Work-life balance support
• Creative and innovative project opportunities

jobs_results.title: Mobile App Developer (React Native)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Latin America

APPLICATION DEADLINE: December 15th CET
Keep in mind that we will only start reviewing the applications once the deadline is over.

Bitrefill is the leading crypto e-commerce site worldwide, fostering a circular economy that allows people to opt out from the traditional banking systems and embrace freedom. We make it easy for people to live on crypto around the world.

Does this sound like something to you? Then keep reading :)
Your Mission:

As our Mobile App Developer, you will work on migrating the current web-based experience of Bitrefill into native mobile for iOS and Android. A large percentage of our users are mobile and your job will be ensuring that they have the best possible experience using Bitrefill on the app.

Relevant UX adaptations of the web-based flow will be done for the respective platforms as appropriate, as well as building out features only available on native apps, such as native login, inter-app communication, push notifications, and much more.
Our Tech Stack:
• Node/TypeScript
• React
• React Native
• MongoDB, MySQL

Your Responsibilities:
• Responsibility for the UX, functionality and speed of our app and commercial platform;
• Building and deploying new code, features and products, as well as maintaining and improving old code;
• Working closely with our Communications and Management Teams to ensure optimal prioritization and streamlined deployment;
• Being metrics driven - continuously evaluate that what we're doing is working, helping users understand what Bitrefill is and how to best use it;
• Being able to understand and work with pre-existing codebase and navigate it independently;
• Be hungry to learn, fast to execute, do a lot with little, and care strongly about your product and users;
• Be a team player and a good friend who will contribute to our unpretentious culture.

You bring with you:
• You reside in: EU/Americas timezones
• You have a minimum of 3+ years of Mobile app development experience and 5+ years of general programming experience
• You have frontend development skills with a focus on React Native and TypeScript
• A strong digital portfolio that demonstrates the above
• Strong written and verbal communication skills

It's a plus if you also:
• Have a big influence on the product, so a good sense of UX / design is a strong advantage;
• Crypto experience is not a requirement but a strong plus - we’ll teach you what you need to know, but you need to have a passion for the movement;
• Have an understanding of native languages (Swift, Objective-C, Java and Kotlin) and React Native Modules;
• Experience integrating third party services.

We Offer:

Bitrefill believes in the freedom to work remotely and offering our team members flexibility. We’ve built our entire business around this. Have no fear; you will never feel lonely, and you'll have the chance to meet your coworkers in person at our biannual team retreats. Here are some reasons people choose us:

- To become part of a talented team with high ambitions for a world where crypto is money for everyday use

- A challenging workplace and a great education when it comes to everything involving cryptocurrency

- Besides a competitive salary, we offer outstanding perks and benefits to make your experience at Bitrefill the best:
• Option to get paid in crypto - at Bitrefill we walk the walk!
• Freedom to work from anywhere (with a reliable and strong internet connection)!
• Computer with necessary accessories
• Remote Workspace Allowance - Ergonomic chairs and desks are an important part of a good home office
• Educational Allowance - 300€ per year + subscriptions on the most enrichment learning platforms in the market!
• Biannual team retreats consist of two get-togethers every year (which means, get your passport ready!)
• 25 paid vacation days + a number of days to spend on your own country's national holidays!
• Paid parental leave - here, your work adapts to your personal life, not the other way around!
• Wellness Allowance - 600€ per year - important to get you moving when you sit all day in front of a computer!
• Global Health Insurance - We want to give you wings so you can fly high but you have to be safe after all!

APPLICATION DEADLINE: December 15th CET
Keep in mind that we will only start processing the applications once the deadline is over.

Disclaimer

Please be aware of potential recruitment scams. Bitrefill will never ask you for money during the recruitment process.

All our communication happens via our official/career site email addresses (@message.teamtailor.com, @bitrefill.com) and only after applying via Teamtailor Careers site.

This offer from "Bitrefill" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
Are you excited about shaping the future of sports betting technology? Join the Sportsbook team and contribute to our in-house Sportsbook platform that hosts multiple brands. Our sophisticated system leverages Java for robust development, Kafka for real-time data streaming, and Spring Boot for creating powerful services. You’ll work with various live sports feed integrations and utilise RabbitMQ for efficient message handling.
Our platform is engineered for high performance, ensuring high availability and scalability to handle high throughput and peak loads. We also prioritise rigorous performance testing to maintain superior reliability and speed.
If you’re passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to make a significant impact in the sports betting industry, we want to hear from you!"

When it comes to being successful at Sportserve, there's more to it than just being really good at the technical stuff. It's also your ability to be an awesome problem solver. And here's the thing, we totally get that we can't all be experts in everything, right? So, it's all about having that thirst for knowledge and being passionate about learning. You'll also need amazing attention to detail, so if something seems off, you won't rest until you've figured out what's going on. We see ourselves as a cool group of people who love coming up with new ideas and making things happen. As long as you have a true passion for creating awesome stuff, you'll fit right in.

What you'll be getting up to:
• Develop mobile apps based on technical and functional specifications provided by the business.
• Continued maintenance, development, and bug fixes for the existing mobile application.
• Utilise source control tools such as Gitlab for maintaining code versioning and releases.
• Test the app on different mobile devices and identify any technical problems.
• Work with the team to manage, optimise and customise multiple mobile applications.
• Attend daily meetings to report on assigned tasks’ progress and attend fortnightly meetings for project planning and other meetings from time to time.
• Complete tasks & deliver projects on time and to the highest standards.
• Contribute ideas for making the application better and easier to use.

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or any related technical field.
• 5+ years of working experience in mobile development.
• 2-3+ years of working with the Flutter framework.
• Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
• Must have built at least two Android and/or iOS apps with Flutter.
• Ability to write and interpret technical documentation.
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, including automated testing and building.
• Experience working in an agile development process.
• Be proficient in using version control and continuous integration, with tools like GIT.
• Write clear, maintainable and testable code that you are proud of.
• Good oral and written English communication skills.
• Ability to work in a team and work well under pressure and deadlines.
• Ability to organise and manage multiple priorities.
• Independent but collaborative, driven, and assertive.
• Knowledge about the Clean Architecture and SOLID principles.

Nice to have:
• Experience in the online gaming industry or similar domains.
• Background in continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).
• Understanding of automated testing for mobile apps.
• Strong problem-solving and organizational skills.
• Ability to adapt and manage multiple priorities effectively.
• *We warmly invite applications in English.

Diversity & Inclusion at Sportserve

At Sportserve, we are deeply committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We believe in building a team that reflects a wide array of backgrounds, skills and perspectives. Embracing diversity not only enriches our work culture but also drives innovation and excellence. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, where everyone’s contribution is valued and respected.

If you’re a passionate about technology and looking to start your career in an international, forward-thinking Sports Betting company, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now to become part of our exciting journey!

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product – BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored—our team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
• Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
• Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
• Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
• Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
• Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
• Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
• Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
• Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
• Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
• Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
• Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
• Are truly passionate about mobile development.
• Can communicate in English (B2+).
• Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
• Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
• Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
• An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
• Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
• Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
• Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
• Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ”another big IT corporation”— we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT’s mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let’s chat! 😉

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. 🙂

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we’re looking for:
• Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
• Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
• Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
• Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
• Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
• Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
• Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
• Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
• Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
• Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
• Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
• Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
• Fast-track your independent developer career
• Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
• A recruitment process that values your time
• Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.
